title: Car rental damage reports and inspection photos
dataVerified: Renter name, vehicle VIN, damage description, pre/post-rental photos, charges
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents altered damage reports (rental company claiming pre-existing damage). Domain binding verifies rental company. Prevents damage fraud. Liability dispute evidence. Multi-page: Damage reports with photos are multi-page.
